title: Sorrows Fall
description: "The promise and the threat of sorrow begins and ends at the tip of it's blade."This phrase is a mere prelude to death and destruction. The decades long cold war between the Hyperia and Incorporated Space is coming to a bloody end and both sides will do anything to get their hands on the top secret bioweapon known only as Sorrow.But this weapon has other ideas.
author: Davonne Burns
